characters: A man wearing a red helmet and a green jacket is riding a motorcycle. The man falls off the motorcycle in the middle of the road.
summary: The vehicle is driving on a rural road. A man wearing a red helmet and a green jacket is riding a motorcycle in the opposite direction. The man suddenly falls off the motorcycle and lands in the middle of the road, directly in the path of the vehicle. This creates a dangerous situation requiring immediate reaction from the driver.
actions: The vehicle is driving at a constant speed on a rural road. The driver maintains the speed until the motorcyclist falls off the motorcycle. The driver will need to decelerate to avoid hitting the motorcyclist.
key_objects: 1) Front: A man wearing a red helmet and a green jacket, approximately 5 meters away, falling off a motorcycle and landing in the middle of the road.
